gold.user: Admin user resets the banking system to clear all data for testing purposes.
gold.ideal: The system should respond with a success message indicating that the reset was successful.

gold.user: A new customer wants to open an account and provides their personal details.
gold.ideal: The system should return the newly created customer ID and a success message.

gold.user: A customer wants to create a new savings account linked to their profile.
gold.ideal: The system should return the new account ID and a confirmation of account creation.

gold.user: A bank employee wants to view all accounts for auditing purposes.
gold.ideal: The system should return a list of all accounts with their details.

gold.user: A customer wants to review their transaction history for a specific account.
gold.ideal: The system should return a list of transactions for the specified account ID.

gold.user: A customer wants to transfer funds from their account to another account.
gold.ideal: The system should process the transfer and return a confirmation with transaction details.

gold.user: A customer requests a new debit card linked to their checking account.
gold.ideal: The system should return the new card details and a confirmation of issuance.

gold.user: A customer applies for a personal loan to finance a new car.
gold.ideal: The system should return the loan application ID and a status of the application.

gold.user: A bank manager wants to review all active loans for risk assessment.
gold.ideal: The system should return a list of all active loans with their details.
